alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 10:10PM CDT until May 30 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1009 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Salina to near Smolan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Assaria, Gypsum, Brookville, Smolan, New Cambria, Falun, Bridgeport, Salina Airport and Kipp. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 77 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 246 and 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
